definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: The nib is in white gold and is rhodium-plated.
sentences.chinese: 笔尖为白金且为铑被镀。

sentences.english: Rhodium-plated pierced earrings with Jonquil crystal lemon and leaf in Peridot crystal.
sentences.chinese: 铑镀穿耳环与信奉水晶柠檬叶在橄榄石晶体。

sentences.english: Rhodium-plated hair clip with Jonquil crystal lemon and leaf in Peridot crystal.
sentences.chinese: 淡黄色的水晶柠檬配橄榄色的叶子，金属部分镀铑。

sentences.english: Rhodium-plated brooch with entwined clear crystal pavé loops.
sentences.chinese: 铑被镀的别针与被纠缠的清楚水晶铺圈。

sentences.english: Rhodium in rhodium plating bath was determined by spectrophotometry with sodium hypochlorite as chromogenic agent.
sentences.chinese: 用次氯酸钠作显色剂光度测定镀铑溶液中的铑。

sentences.english: Rhodium in rhodium plating bath was determined by spectrophotometry with sodium hypochlorite as chromogenic agent.
sentences.chinese: 用次氯酸钠作显色剂光度测定镀铑溶液中的铑。

sentences.english: The trace Rh was concentrated with minified nickel sulfide fire assay before it was determined.
sentences.chinese: 测定之前，痕量铑用小硫化镍试金富集分离。

sentences.english: CAB Signal Banana, non magnetic, eutectic brass, Rhodium over silver plate.
sentences.chinese: 香蕉插，无磁性结晶黄铜，镀银上镀铑。

sentences.english: Rhodium was decomposed through microwave digestion and ammonium rhodium hexachloride was dissolved with high purity water.
sentences.chinese: 利用微波消解法溶解铑，超纯水溶解氯铑酸铵。

sentences.english: Rhodium was decomposed through microwave digestion and ammonium rhodium hexachloride was dissolved with high purity water.
sentences.chinese: 利用微波消解法溶解铑，超纯水溶解氯铑酸铵。

sentences.english: Complemented with a rhodium plated chain.
Silver dials are then rhodium or even fine silver to prevent tarnishing.
sentences.chinese: 银色表盘铑甚至是精细的银，以防止变色。

sentences.english: JAT OFC with Rhodium Plated Y type Speaker Terminal.
sentences.chinese: 一体成型无氧铜高纯度镀铑Y型喇叭端子。

sentences.english: Silver plate. Thick Brass nut, Gold plate.
sentences.chinese: 黄铜镀金，镀银上镀铑，厚螺母，信号插座。

sentences.english: He wanted to plate copper with silver.
sentences.chinese: 香蕉插，纯黄铜镀金，镀银上镀铑。

sentences.english: One 120 cable terminating hole with set screw.
sentences.chinese: 研磨红铜叉，镀银上镀铑，120线孔，螺丝锁紧。

definition: see 釕銱兒|钌铞儿[liao4 diao4 r5]/Taiwan pr. [liao3]
the coating of sth that has been chrome-plated or copper-plated etc
